name: Wrecked! Unfair Car Stunts
description:
Car stunts game made by you as a kid in your imagination. Drawn and colored. And unfair.

Choose your favorite vehicle and wreck it in any of the 40 levels the game has to offer!
Face extreme ramp challenges and jump at the right moment!

In Wrecked! Unfair Car Stunts you will...

  • race through ramps, bridges and running trains
  • do amazing back and front flips in the air
  • smash your keyboard and break your PC at least 3 times
  • cry of happiness after beating a level your friend couldn't
  • play that car game you imagined when you were a kid
  • be able to crash your car indefinitely!
